overview: The Ikenga, which belongs to the King of Amanze, is missing therefore the people of Amanze plan to attack the people of Akabo over the missing Ikenga. The king places his daughter as the price for anyone who first finds his Ikenga. The gods have chosen Mgbada and Eneh for the mission, but there seems to be a lot of mischief going on.
title: Secret Adventure
